title: Emmy Awards 2019: Best-dressed stars on the red carpet, from Gwendoline Christie to Laverne Cox
text:
The Primetime Emmy Awards never fail to attract the biggest names in the entertainment industry and beyond.

Taking place on Sunday 22 September at the Microsoft Theatre in Los Angeles, this year's event will see the stars of Fleabag, Killing Eve and Game of Thrones battle it out to win the most prestigious accolades.

Dascha Polanco, star of hit Netflix series Orange Is The New Black, made a striking entrance this evening on the red carpet, wearing a white Christian Siriano gown with bright pink, oversized bows on either shoulder.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

Meanwhile, Pose actor Indya Moore stunned in a corseted, pearl-white dress by Louis Vuitton.

Click through the gallery above to see all the best-dressed stars on the red carpet at the Emmy Awards.

For everything you need to know about this year's Emmy Awards, click here.

To follow The Independent's live blog covering the glitzy event, click here.
